SEARCH
Package UIs.Seller.Controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
UIs.Seller.Controllers.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
Class managing a seller's orders. By using this class, a seller can view their order history, prepare an order, handle an order issue requested by a customer, and confirm a reshipment order.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderController(Seller user, DataBase database)
    Constructs an instance of OrderController with given user and database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    displayOrderHistory()
    Displays the seller's order history, and the user can choose an order to see its details.
    void
    interactWithOrder(Order order)
    For a selected order, the seller can prepare the order, handle the problem related to the order, or confirm the reshipment reception when a customer sends back items.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • OrderController

      public OrderController(Seller user, DataBase database)
      Constructs an instance of OrderController with given user and database.
      Parameters:
      user - Seller, user is a seller
      database - DataBase of UniShop containing information about orders

  • Method Details

    • displayOrderHistory

      public boolean displayOrderHistory()
      Displays the seller's order history, and the user can choose an order to see its details. Returns true in order for the calling method to continue the interaction loop.
      Returns:
      Boolean, true in order for the calling method to continue the interaction loop

    • interactWithOrder

      public void interactWithOrder(Order order)
      For a selected order, the seller can prepare the order, handle the problem related to the order, or confirm the reshipment reception when a customer sends back items.
      Parameters:
      order - Order, order selected by the seller
